game.name: Blood Country
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Blood Country is a roguelike shooter set in the Wild West. Kill outlaws with your guns, knife, and dynamite. Defeat the gang's leader, and free the country from outlaws, bandits, and scoundrels.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Blood Country is a roguelike shooter set in the Wild West. Kill outlaws with your guns, knife, and dynamite. Defeat the gang's leader, and free the country from outlaws, bandits, and scoundrels.
